content.question: Which of the following most directly contributed to the request expressed in the excerpt?

choices.label: The removal of Native Americans east of the Mississippi
The passage of legislation ending the international slave trade
The desire for international trade and access to global markets
The expansion of westward settlement following the Civil War

content.answer: The desire for international trade and access to global markets

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
